title: Corpse Reviver #5 Recipe
full_text:
Corpse Reviver #5 Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
Ice
1
ounce
blanco tequila
1
ounce
Cocchi Americano
1
ounce
pineapple gum syrup
(such as
Small Hand Foods)
1
ounce
freshly squeezed
lemon juice
2
dashes
absinthe
Lemon peel
, for garnish
Directions
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add tequila, Cocchi Americano, pineapple gum syrup, and lemon juice. Shake vigorously and strain into a cocktail glass.
Top drink with 2 dashes absinthe. Garnish with a lemon twist.
Special equipment
strainer, cocktail shaker
Tequila
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
